casebody.data:
Louis Cherry and Marsha Gordon
v.
Gail Wiesner, City of Raleigh, and Raleigh Board of Adjustment City of Raleigh, a municipal corporation
v.
Raleigh Board of Adjustment, Louis W. Cherry, III, Marsha G. Gordon, and Gail P. Wiesner No. 103P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2016 Andrew J. Petesch, Attorney at Law, Andrew H. Erteschik, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Wiesner, Gail. Dorothy K. Leapley, Deputy City Attorney, Nicolette Fulton, Associate City Attorney, for City of Raleigh. John M. Silverstein, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Raleigh Board of Adjustment. Joseph S. Dowdy, Attorney at Law, Phillip Absolom Harris, Jr., Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Cherry, Louis, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 22nd of March 20 16 by Respondent (Gail Wiesner) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of August 2016."
